decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to quickly fill up the graveyard with powerful creatures and then use spells like Reanimate and Animate Dead to bring them back onto the battlefield. By utilizing cards like Entomb and Thoughtseize to set up the graveyard and protect the combo pieces with counter spells like Force of Will and Daze, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with massive threats like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier. The deck also includes disruptive cards like Brainstorm and Polluted Delta to maintain card advantage and control the game.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly get out powerful cards such as Emrakul, the Aeons Torn, Omniscience, and LÃ³rien Revealed by using Show and Tell to cheat them into play. The deck also includes a variety of card draw and counter spells to protect the combo and ensure its success. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and spells before they have a chance to respond, ultimately leading to a quick victory.

The main concept of this deck is to establish control over the game by using artifacts as part of a prison strategy. The deck aims to lock down opponents with cards like Leyline of the Void and Chalice of the Void while also ramping up mana production with cards like Grim Monolith and Urza's Tower. Karn, the Great Creator and Ugin, Eye of the Storms provide additional control options, while cards like Ghost Vacuum and Pithing Needle disrupt opposing strategies. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Eldrazi Confluence to seal the victory.

The deck focuses on quickly getting out powerful cards like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Omniscience through the use of Show and Tell. Various counter spells like Force of Will are included to protect the combo pieces, while cards like Hullbreacher and Chalice of the Void disrupt opponent's plans. Intuition and Cunning Wish provide versatility in finding key pieces or answers. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful permanents and game-ending combos, utilizing the fast mana from Chrome Mox, Ancient Tomb, and City of Traitors.

The main concept of this Cloudpost Ramp deck is to quickly ramp up mana using Cloudpost and other lands, while utilizing powerful spells and creatures to control the game and ultimately win through a combo or powerful finisher like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn. The deck includes a mix of counterspells, card draw, and disruptive spells to protect the game plan and disrupt the opponent's strategy. Karn, the Great Creator is a key card that can search for powerful artifacts to help lock down the game or provide additional win conditions.

The main concept of the deck is to create a fast, aggressive playstyle using a combination of efficient creatures, disruptive spells, and powerful planeswalkers to control the board and pressure the opponent. Utilizing a mix of creature types and versatile cards like Brainstorm and Thoughtseize, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while building up its own tempo advantage. The inclusion of cards like Force of Will and Daze provide additional protection against threats, allowing the deck to maintain its aggressive pressure and overwhelming the opponent before they can fully establish their own game plan.

The main focus of this UWx Control deck is to control the game through counter spells, removal, and card advantage. It utilizes cards like Force of Will, Brainstorm, and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student to disrupt the opponent's game plan and maintain control of the board. With a mix of counterspells, removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Prismatic Ending, and card advantage engines like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Snapcaster Mage, the deck aims to out-value and out-maneuver the opponent until it can establish a dominant position and close out the game.

The key strategy of this deck is to utilize Mystic Forge to cast spells off the top of the library, while also generating mana with artifacts like Grim Monolith and Basalt Monolith. Tezzeret, Cruel Captain and Karn, the Great Creator provide additional support by tutoring for key pieces and disrupting the opponent's strategy. With a focus on artifacts and powerful synergies, this deck aims to assemble a powerful board state and overwhelm the opponent with a combination of card advantage, mana ramp, and disruptive elements.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly ramp up artifact mana using cards like Lotus Petal, Mox Opal, and Mishra's Bauble to power out powerful artifacts such as Chalice of the Void and Urza's Saga. Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Thought Monitor provide card advantage and synergy with artifacts, while Kappa Cannoneer offers removal. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Force of Will and Metallic Rebuke to control the board. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast, aggressive artifact-based strategy while maintaining control of the game.

The deck heavily revolves around the synergy between powerful artifacts like Mystic Forge, Karn, the Great Creator, and Tezzeret, Cruel Captain to generate infinite mana and card advantage. The key strategy involves using cards like The One Ring, Manifold Key, and Voltaic Key to untap artifacts like Grim Monolith and Urza's Tower for explosive combos. With access to efficient mana sources like Lotus Petal and Ancient Tomb, the deck aims to quickly assemble its key pieces and overwhelm opponents with a flurry of threats and game-winning plays.

The deck focuses on assembling powerful artifact combinations and utilizing Mystic Forge to play cards off the top of the library. It includes cards that tap, untap, and search for artifacts, along with powerful artifacts such as The One Ring and Karn, the Great Creator. The deck aims to generate mana quickly with cards like Grim Monolith and Lotus Petal, and manipulate the top of the library with cards like Expedition Map and Tezzeret, Cruel Captain. Overall, the deck aims to set up a strong board state and overwhelm the opponent with a combination of artifacts and powerful spells.

The main focus of this deck is to use creatures with activated abilities, such as Nadu, Winged Wisdom and Nomads en-Kor, to combo off and generate mana through Gaea's Cradle. The deck also utilizes various utility creatures like Allosaurus Shepherd and Endurance to protect its combo pieces. Chord of Calling and Green Sun's Zenith allow for tutoring and consistency in finding key cards. The deck aims to quickly ramp up and overwhelm the opponent with a large board presence, culminating in a finisher like Craterhoof Behemoth.

This deck aims to utilize the combo of Painter's Servant and Grindstone to mill opponents' libraries, while also utilizing cards like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student to generate card advantage and control the board. The deck also includes artifact synergies with cards like Lotus Petal and Mox Opal, along with countermagic in the form of Force of Will and Metallic Rebuke. Urza's Saga provides additional value by tutoring for key artifacts, creating a powerful and synergistic engine that aims to disrupt opponents and win the game through a unique combo strategy.

This deck aims to maintain a fast and aggressive playstyle by utilizing low-cost creatures and powerful instant spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. By efficiently utilizing card draw and counterspells, the deck can maintain tempo and protect its threats from removal. The focus is on applying pressure early in the game with cards like Delver of Secrets and Dragon's Rage Channeler, while also having the ability to close out the game with powerful finishers like Murktide Regent. The mana base is designed to provide consistent access to both blue and red mana sources for casting spells.

This UWx Control deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan through countering spells and managing the board with removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Roiling Dragonstorm. The deck also utilizes card filtering with Ponder and Brainstorm to find key pieces while maintaining a consistent mana base with fetchlands and dual lands. The inclusion of Murktide Regent and Clarion Conqueror provide threats that can quickly close out the game, while Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student offers card advantage and versatility. The deck aims to control the game tempo and outvalue the opponent to secure victory.

Control the game by utilizing a variety of spells to disrupt your opponent's strategy, while also maintaining card advantage and tempo advantage through cards like Narset, Parter of Veils, Teferi, Time Raveler, and Brainstorm. Use removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Prismatic Ending to handle threats, while also locking down the opponent's mana base with Back to Basics. Consign to Memory provides a versatile option for dealing with threats or drawing cards. Lavinia, Azorius Renegade and Containment Priest help to disrupt opposing strategies, while Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Quantum Riddler offer card selection and advantage.
